animals.name: fox
animals.story:
In the woods, a sly fox goes,
Look at it. Go. Go. Go.
With fur red and eyes so bright,
It hunts at night and out of sight.

animals.name: rabbit
animals.story:
Hop, hop, hop,
The rabbit won' stop.
With long ears and fluffy tail,
It jumps and jumps without fail.

animals.name: frog
animals.story:
In the pond,
a frog does dwell, 
Jumping high, and croaking as well. 
With eyes wide 
it waits for a fly, 
Leaping swiftly, reaching the sky.

animals.name: lion
animals.story:
In the wild,
a lion roams. 
Its' yellow mane, 
the wind blows. 
The king of beasts, 
brave and bold.
In the grasslands, its' story unfolds.

animals.name: tiger
animals.story:
In the jungle,
a tiger prowls. 
Graceful and stealthy, 
it makes no sounds. 
With coat of orange and black, 
it hides and waits, for a tasty snack.

animals.name: mouse
animals.story:
In a cozy hole,
a gray mouse stays. 
Tiny and shy, 
it darts and plays. 
Gentle and quiet, 
it's quick on its' feet.
It runs back home, for its time to sleep.

animals.name: unicorn
animals.story:
In a secret meadow,
a beautiful sight. 
A unicorn prances, 
in the gold sunlight. 
Its mane sparkles, 
and its horn shines.
It runs across the rainbow,
 so high in the sky.

animals.name: dragon
animals.story:
In tales long ago,
a dragon soars. 
The people run, 
and slam their doors. 
With scales of iron, 
and breath of fire.
It is tamed by no one, and it does, as it desires.

animals.name: pig
animals.story:
They come in lots of colors,
not just pink and white. 
It oinks and plays, 
throughout the day, but snores at night. 
It loves to get dirty, 
and has a curly tail.
I bring it food, in my metal pail.

animals.name: wolf
animals.story:
In the moonlit woods,
a wolf on the mountain high. 
Howls beautifully, to the star filled sky. 
It listens, and looks out,
eyes shining and keen. 
It peers out at the forest,
it is peaceful and serene.

animals.name: panda
animals.story:
In a bamboo forest,
a gentle panda dwells. 
Its' colors are black and white, 
 but its beauty is not pale. 
It has a peaceful gaze, 
 eating leaves in a green maze.

animals.name: bear
animals.story:
Among the tall, tall trees, 
 a bear roams free. 
 A body big and strong, it plays, travels, and eats all day long. 
Furry and grand, 
 a wonderful animal, in every land.
